statements: SELECT * FROM basketball_game_tickets WHERE ticket_id = 1;
SELECT seat_number, price FROM basketball_game_tickets WHERE event_date = '2022-11-15';
SELECT * FROM basketball_game_tickets WHERE total_tickets_sold > 100;
SELECT ticket_id, event_date, event_time FROM basketball_game_tickets WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM basketball_game_tickets ORDER BY price DESC, event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM basketball_game_tickets WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_time ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, seat_number, total_tickets_sold FROM basketball_game_tickets WHERE event_date = '2022-12-31' AND total_tickets_sold > 100 ORDER BY ticket_id ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, event_date, event_time FROM basketball_game_tickets WHERE price BETWEEN 25 AND 50 ORDER BY price DESC, seat_number ASC;
SELECT seat_number, price FROM basketball_game_tickets WHERE event_date >= '2023-01-01' AND total_tickets_sold < 50 ORDER BY seat_number ASC, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM basketball_game_tickets WHERE event_date = '2023-11-15' AND event_time = '18:00' AND total_tickets_sold BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY event_date ASC, event_time ASC;
SELECT game_id, game_date, venue_id, home_team, away_team, ticket_price FROM basketball_games;
SELECT venue_id, home_team, ticket_price FROM basketball_games WHERE game_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM basketball_games WHERE home_team = 'Lakers' ORDER BY game_date DESC;
SELECT away_team, ticket_price, game_date FROM basketball_games WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY ticket_price ASC;
SELECT section, row, seat_number FROM seating_arrangements WHERE is_reserved = false ORDER BY section, row, seat_number;
SELECT * FROM basketball_games WHERE game_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY game_date DESC;
SELECT home_team, away_team, ticket_price FROM basketball_games WHERE venue_id = 1;
SELECT seat_id, section, row, seat_number FROM seating_arrangements WHERE is_reserved = false ORDER BY section, row, seat_number;
SELECT * FROM basketball_games JOIN seating_arrangements ON basketball_games.venue_id = seating_arrangements.venue_id WHERE ticket_price < 50;

SELECT game_id, home_team, away_team, seat_id FROM basketball_games JOIN seating_arrangements ON basketball_games.venue_id = seating_arrangements.venue_id WHERE game_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales;
SELECT customer_name, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price >= 50;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM ticket_sales WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date, venue_name FROM event_logistics WHERE event_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT section_name, seat_number, availability FROM seating_arrangements WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY section_name ASC, seat_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales;
SELECT customer_name, ticket_price, purchase_date FROM ticket_sales;
SELECT DISTINCT section_name FROM seating_arrangements;
SELECT event_name, event_date, venue_name FROM event_logistics ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, event_name, ticket_price, purchase_date FROM ticket_sales JOIN event_logistics ON ticket_sales.event_id = event_logistics.event_id;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales;
SELECT ticket_id, game_id, seat_number, price FROM ticket_sales WHERE price > 100;
SELECT game_id, seat_number, ticket_id, price FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT team1, team2, game_date FROM basketball_games WHERE game_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, venue_id, event_date FROM event_logistics WHERE venue_id = 1;
SELECT ticket_id, price FROM ticket_sales WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT game_id, seat_number, price FROM ticket_sales WHERE seat_number BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT seating_id, section, seat_capacity FROM seating_arrangements WHERE section = 'VIP';
SELECT event_id, game_id, event_date FROM event_logistics WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date;
SELECT game_id, team1, team2, game_date FROM basketball_games WHERE team1 LIKE '%Lakers%' OR team2 LIKE '%Lakers%' ORDER BY game_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT customer_name, seat_number FROM tickets WHERE ticket_id = 1;
SELECT game_id, seat_number FROM tickets ORDER BY seat_number DESC;
SELECT customer_name, game_id FROM tickets WHERE seat_number > 100 ORDER BY ticket_id;
SELECT customer_name, game_id, ticket_price FROM tickets, games WHERE tickets.game_id = games.game_id;
SELECT * FROM tickets INNER JOIN games ON tickets.game_id = games.game_id
SELECT customer_name, game_date, arena FROM tickets INNER JOIN games ON tickets.game_id = games.game_id
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT customer_name, game_date, ticket_price FROM bookings INNER JOIN games ON bookings.game_id = games.game_id
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, seat_number FROM bookings INNER JOIN tickets ON bookings.ticket_id = tickets.ticket_id
